Name: LOR SAN TEKKA
parole: This will begin to make things right. I've traveled too far, and seen toomuch, to ignore the despair in the galaxy. Without the Jedi, there can be no balance in the Force.

Name: POE
parole: Well, because of you now we have a chance. The General's been after this for a long time.

Name: LOR SAN TEKKA
parole: The General. To me, she's royalty. Well, she certainly is that.

Name: POE
parole: We've got company.

Name: POE
parole: You have to hide.

Name: LOR SAN TEKKA
parole: You have to leave. Go!

Name: POE
parole: Come on, BB-8! Hurry!

Name: POE
parole: I see 'em!

Name: POE
parole: You take this. It's safer with you than it is with me. You get as far away from here as you can. Do you hear me? I'll come back for you! It will be alright.

Name: SENIOR TROOPER
parole: Stay here.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Look how old you've become.

Name: LOR SAN TEKKA
parole: Something far worse has happened to you.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: You know what I've come for.

Name: LOR SAN TEKKA
parole: I know where you come from. Before you called yourself Kylo Ren.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: The map to Skywalker. We know you've found it, and now you're going to give it to the First Order.

Name: LOR SAN TEKKA
parole: The First Order rose from the dark side... you did not.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: I'll show you the dark side.

Name: LOR SAN TEKKA
parole: You may try, but you cannot deny the truth that is your family.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: You're so right.

Name: POE
parole: So who talks first? You talk first?

Name: KYLO REN
parole: The old man gave it to you.

Name: POE
parole: It's just very hard to understand you with all the...

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Search him.

Name: POE
parole: Apparatus

Name: STORMTROOPER 1
parole: Nothing, sir.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Put him on board.

Name: CAPTAIN PHASMA
parole: Sir, the villagers.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Kill them all.

Name: CAPTAIN PHASMA
parole: On my command!

Name: CAPTAIN PHASMA
parole: Fire!

Name: STORMTROOPER 2
parole: Nothing here. Go ahead!

Name: POE
parole: All right. All right!

Name: CAPTAIN PHASMA
parole: FN-2187. Submit your blaster for inspection.

Name: FINN
parole: Yes, Captain.

Name: CAPTAIN PHASMA
parole: And who gave you permission to remove that helmet?

Name: FINN
parole: I'm sorry, Captain.

Name: CAPTAIN PHASMA
parole: Report to my division at once.

Name: UNKAR
parole: What you've brought me today is worth... Hmmm... One quarter portion.

Name: REY
parole: Tal'ama parqual!

Name: REY
parole: Parqual zatana!

Name: REY
parole: NOMA.

Name: REY
parole: Shhhh.

Name: REY
parole: That's just Teedo. Wants you for parts. He has no respect for anyone. Your antenna's bent. Where do you come from?

Name: REY
parole: Classified. Really? Me too. Big secret. Niima Outpost is that way, stay off Kelvin Ridge.

Name: REY
parole: Keep away from the Sinking Fields in the north, you'll drown in the sand.

Name: REY
parole: Don't follow me. Town is that way. No!

Name: REY
parole: In the morning, you go. You're welcome.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: I had no idea we had the best pilot in the Resistance on board. Comfortable?

Name: POE
parole: Not really.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: I'm impressed. No one has been able to get out of you what you did with the map.

Name: POE
parole: Might wanna rethink your technique.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Where is it?

Name: POE
parole: The Resistance will not be intimidated by you.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Where... is it?

Name: KYLO REN
parole: It's in a droid. A BB unit.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Well then. If it's on Jakku, we'll soon have it.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: I leave that to you.

Name: REY
parole: Don't give up. He still might show up. Whoever it is you're waiting for. Classified. I know all about waiting.

Name: REY
parole: For my family. They'll be back. One day. Come on.

Name: UNKAR
parole: These five pieces are worth... Let me see here... One half portion.

Name: REY
parole: Last week they were a half portion each.

Name: UNKAR
parole: What about the droid?

Name: REY
parole: What about him?

Name: UNKAR
parole: I'll pay for him.

Name: UNKAR
parole: Sixty portions.

Name: REY
parole: Actually... the droid's not for sale. Come on.

Name: UNKAR
parole: Follow the girl and get that droid.

Name: STORMTROOPER
parole: Ren wants the prisoner.

Name: STORMTROOPER
parole: Turn here.

Name: STORMTROOPER
parole: Listen carefully you do exactly as I say, I can get you out of here.

Name: POE
parole: If what ?

Name: FINN
parole: This is a rescue, I'm helping you escape. Can you fly a TIE fighter?

Name: POE
parole: You with the Resistance ?!

Name: FINN
parole: What? No no no! I'm breaking you out. Can you fly a TIE fighter?

Name: POE
parole: I can fly anything. Why, why are you helping me?

Name: FINN
parole: Because it's the right thing to do.

Name: POE
parole: You need a pilot.

Name: FINN
parole: I need a pilot.

Name: POE
parole: We're gonna do this.

Name: FINN
parole: Yeah?

Name: FINN
parole: Okay, stay calm, stay calm.

Name: POE
parole: I am calm.

Name: FINN
parole: I'm talking to myself. Not yet. Okay, go. This way.

Name: POE
parole: I always wanted to fly one of these things. Can ya shoot?

Name: FINN
parole: Blasters, I can!

Name: POE
parole: Okay, same principal! Use the toggle on the left to switch between missiles, cannons, and mag pulse use the site on the right to aim, triggers to fire!

Name: FINN
parole: This is very complicated

Name: POE
parole: I can fix this.

Name: STAR DESTROYER TECHNICIAN
parole: We have an unsanctioned departure from bay two.

Name: FIRST ORDER COLONEL
parole: Alert General Hux and stop that fighter.

Name: POE
parole: I got it!

Name: POE
parole: Woooahhh! This thing really moves. All right, we gotta take out as many cannons as we can or we're not gonna get very far!

Name: FINN
parole: All right!

Name: POE
parole: I'm gonna get us in position, just stay sharp!

Name: POE
parole: Up ahead! Up ahead! You see it? I've got us dead centered. It's a clean shot.

Name: FINN
parole: Okay, got it.

Name: FINN
parole: YES! You see that?! DID YOU SEE THAT?

Name: POE
parole: I saw it! Hey, what's your name?

Name: POE
parole: FN-whaa?

Name: FINN
parole: That's the only name they ever gave me!

Name: POE
parole: Well I ain't using it! FN, huh? Finn. I'm gonna call you Finn! That all right?

Name: FINN
parole: Finn. Yeah, Finn, I like that! I like that!

Name: POE
parole: I'm Poe. Poe Dameron.

Name: FINN
parole: Good to meet you, Poe!

Name: POE
parole: Good to meet you too, Finn!

Name: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
parole: Sir, they've taken out our turbolasers

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Use the ventral cannons.

Name: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
parole: Yes, sir. Bringing them online

Name: KYLO REN
parole: General Hux. Is it the Resistance pilot?

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Yes, and he had help. From one of our own.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: We're checking the registers now to identify which Stormtrooper it was.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: The one from the village. FN-2187.

Name: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
parole: Sir. Ventral cannons hot.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Fire.

Name: POE
parole: One's coming towards you. My right, your left. Do you see it?

Name: FINN
parole: Hold on! I see it!

Name: POE
parole: Nice shot.

Name: FINN
parole: Where are you going?

Name: POE
parole: We're going back to Jakku. That's where.

Name: FINN
parole: No no no! We can't go back to Jakku! We need to get outta this system!

Name: POE
parole: I got to get to my droid before the First Order does!

Name: FINN
parole: What  a droid?!

Name: POE
parole: That's right. He's a BB unit! Orange and white one of a kind.

Name: FINN
parole: I don't care what color he is! No droid can be that important!

Name: POE
parole: This one is, pal.

Name: FINN
parole: We need to get as far away from the First Order as we can! We go back  to Jakku, we die!

Name: POE
parole: That droid's got a map that leads straight to Luke Skywalker!

Name: FINN
parole: Oh, you gotta be kidding me!!!

Name: CAPTAIN PHASMA
parole: FN-2187 reported to my division, was evaluated and sent to Reconditioning.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: No prior signs of non-conformity?

Name: CAPTAIN PHASMA
parole: This was his first offense.

Name: TECHNICIAN 1
parole: General. They've been hit.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Destroyed?

Name: TECHNICIAN 1
parole: Disabled. They were headed back to Jakku the fighter's projected to crash in the Goazon badlands.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: They were going back for the droid send a squad to the wreckage.

Name: FINN
parole: Poe! Poe!

Name: FINN
parole: Poe!!! POE!

Name: FINN
parole: POE!!! POE!!!

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Supreme Leader Snoke was explicit. Capture the droid if we can, but destroy it if we must.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: How capable are your soldiers, General?

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: I won't have you question my methods.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: They're obviously skilled at committing high treason. Perhaps Leader Snoke should consider using a clone army.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: My men are exceptionally traine programmed from birth

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Then they should have no problem retrieving the droid. Unharmed.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Careful, Ren. That your personal interests not interfere with orders from Leader Snoke.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: I want that map. For your sake, I suggest you get it.

Name: FINN
parole: Water... water... water..

Name: FINN
parole: Awgh, GAH!

Name: REY
parole: Who? Him?

Name: REY
parole: What's your hurry, thief?

Name: FINN
parole: What?! Thief?

Name: FINN
parole: OW! HEY! What?!

Name: REY
parole: The jacket! This droid says you stole it!

Name: FINN
parole: I've had a pretty messed up day, alright?! So I'd appreciate it you stop accusing me

Name: REY
parole: Where'd you get it? It belongs to his master.

Name: FINN
parole: It belonged to Poe Dameron. That was his name, right?

Name: FINN
parole: He was captured... by the First Order! I helped him escape but our ship crashed. Poe didn't make it. Look, I tried to help him. I'm sorry...

Name: REY
parole: So you're with the Resistance?

Name: FINN
parole: Obviously. Yes. I am. I'm with the Resistance, yeah. I'm with the Resistance.

Name: REY
parole: I've never met a Resistance fighter before.

Name: FINN
parole: Well, this is what we look like. Some of us. Others look different.

Name: REY
parole: BB-8 says he's on a secret mission, he has to get back to your base.

Name: FINN
parole: Apparently he's carrying a map that leads to Luke Skywalker, and everyone's after it.

Name: REY
parole: Luke Skywalker? I thought he was a myth.

Name: REY
parole: What is it?

Name: REY
parole: What are you doing?!

Name: FINN
parole: Come on!

Name: FINN
parole: Come on, BB-8!

Name: REY
parole: Let go of me!

Name: FINN
parole: No, we gotta move!

Name: REY
parole: I know how to run without you holding my hand! BB-8 stay close! This way!

Name: STORMTROOPER
parole: Call in the air strike!

Name: REY
parole: They're shooting at both of us!

Name: FINN
parole: Yeah, they saw you with me! You're marked!

Name: REY
parole: Well, thanks for that!

Name: FINN
parole: I'm not the one who chased you down with a stick! Does anyone have blasters around here?!

Name: REY
parole: Are you okay?

Name: REY
parole: Stop taking my hand!

Name: REY
parole: Hey!

Name: FINN
parole: Are you okay?

Name: REY
parole: Yeah. Follow me.

Name: FINN
parole: We can't outrun them!

Name: REY
parole: We might in that quad-jumper!

Name: FINN
parole: We need a pilot!

Name: REY
parole: We've got one!

Name: FINN
parole: You?!

Name: REY
parole: That one's garbage!

Name: REY
parole: The garbage'll do!

Name: REY
parole: Gunner position's down there!

Name: FINN
parole: Y'ever fly this thing?

Name: REY
parole: No! This ship hasn't been flown in years!

Name: FINN
parole: Great. Whoa! I can do this, I can do this--

Name: REY
parole: I can do this, I can do this

Name: UNKAR
parole: HEY!!!! THAT'S MIIIIIIINE!!!

Name: FINN
parole: Whoa! Hey! Oh! Stay low! Stay low!

Name: REY
parole: WHAT?

Name: FINN
parole: Stay low! It confuses their tracking!

Name: REY
parole: BB-8, hold on!

Name: REY
parole: I'M GOING LOW!!!

Name: REY
parole: What are you doing back there? Are you ever gonna fire back?!

Name: FINN
parole: I'm working on it! Are the shields up?

Name: REY
parole: Not so easy without a co-pilot!

Name: FINN
parole: Try sitting in this thing!

Name: FINN
parole: We need cover, quick!

Name: REY
parole: We're about to get some! I hope.

Name: FINN
parole: Damn it!

Name: FINN
parole: Come on... come on...

Name: REY
parole: Nice shot!

Name: FINN
parole: I'm getting pretty good at this!

Name: FINN
parole: The cannon's stuck in forward position, I can't move it! You gotta lose 'em!

Name: REY
parole: Get ready!

Name: FINN
parole: Okay! For what?

Name: FINN
parole: ARE WE REALLY DOING THIS?!

Name: REY
parole: Oh no!

Name: FINN
parole: Whooo!

Name: REY
parole: FINN Good shooting! Thanks! I Now that was some I don't know! I've flying! How did you flown some ships but I've do that?! No one never left the planet! trained you? No one? Your last shot was dead That was amazing! on. You got him with one blast! You set me up for it! It was perfect! That was pretty good.

Name: REY
parole: You're ok. He's with the Resistance. He's going to get you home. We both will. I don't know your name.

Name: FINN
parole: Finn. What's yours.

Name: REY
parole: I'm Rey.

Name: FINN
parole: Rey...

Name: REY
parole: Help me with this! Quick!

Name: FINN
parole: Whoa! What's going on?

Name: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
parole: Sir. We were unable to acquire the droid on Jakku.

Name: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
parole: It escaped capture aboard a stolen Corellian YT model freighter.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: The droid... stole a freighter?

Name: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
parole: Not exactly, sir. It had help.

Name: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
parole: We have no confirmation, but we believe FN-2187 may have been helped in the escape--

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Anything else?

Name: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
parole: The two were accompanied by a girl.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: What girl?

Name: REY
parole: It's the motivator! Grab me a Harris wrench check in there!

Name: FINN
parole: How bad is it?!

Name: REY
parole: If we wanna live, not good!

Name: FINN
parole: They're hunting for us now, we gotta get outta this system!

Name: REY
parole: BB-8 said the location of the Resistance Base is need to know if I'm taking you there, I need to know!

Name: FINN
parole: This?

Name: FINN
parole: You gotta tell us where the base is. I don't speak that. Alright, between us, I'm not with the Resistance, okay? I'm just trying to get away from the First Order but you tell us where your base is, I'll get there first deal?! Droid, please.

Name: REY
parole: Pilex driver, hurry!

Name: REY
parole: So where's your base?

Name: FINN
parole: Go on BB-8, tell her. Please!

Name: REY
parole: The Ileenium system?

Name: FINN
parole: Yeah, the Ileenium system, that's the one -- get us there as fast as you can.

Name: REY
parole: I'll drop you two at Ponemah Terminal. I need the bonding tape, hurry!

Name: FINN
parole: What about you?

Name: REY
parole: I gotta get back to Jakku!

Name: FINN
parole: BACK TO Jakku?! Why does everyone always wanna go back to Jakku?! !

Name: REY
parole: No, that one! No. No. The one I'm pointing to! No. NO. NO. If we don't patch it up, the propulsion tank will overflow and flood the ship with poisonous gas!

Name: FINN
parole: This?

Name: REY
parole: Yes!

Name: FINN
parole: Hey. Rey. You're a pilot you can fly anywhere! Why go back?! You got a family? You got a boyfriend? Cute boyfriend?

Name: REY
parole: None of your business, THAT'S WHY!

Name: FINN
parole: That can't be good.

Name: REY
parole: Someone's locked onto us all controls are overridden.

Name: REY
parole: Get off. Get off! See anything?

Name: FINN
parole: Oh no.

Name: FINN
parole: It's the First Order.

Name: REY
parole: What do we do  there must be

Name: FINN
parole: You said poisonous gas

Name: REY
parole: ah, but I fixed that

Name: FINN
parole: Can you unfix it?

Name: REY
parole: C'mon BB-8.

Name: FINN
parole: I got it.

Name: REY
parole: Oooh...

Name: FINN
parole: I'm okay. BB-8 get off me...

Name: REY
parole: You think this'll work on the Stormtroopers?

Name: FINN
parole: Yeah. Their masks filter out smoke, not toxins.

Name: FINN
parole: Hurry!

Name: REY
parole: I'm hurrying!

Name: HAN
parole: Chewie, we're home.

Name: HAN
parole: Where are the others? Where's the pilot?

Name: REY
parole: I'm the pilot

Name: HAN
parole: You?

Name: REY
parole: No, it's true we're the only ones on board.

Name: FINN
parole: You can understand that thing?

Name: HAN
parole: And that thing can understand you too, so watch it. Come on outta there.

Name: HAN
parole: Where'd you get this ship?

Name: REY
parole: Niima Outpost.

Name: HAN
parole: Jakku?! That junkyard?

Name: FINN
parole: Thank you! Junkyard!

Name: HAN
parole: Told ya we should've double-checked the Western Reaches! Who had it, Ducain?

Name: REY
parole: I stole it from Unkar Plutt. He stole it from the Irving Boys, who stole it from Ducain.

Name: HAN
parole: Who stole it from me! Well, you tell him Han Solo just stole back the Millennium Falcon for good.

Name: REY
parole: This is the Millennium Falcon? You're Han Solo?

Name: HAN
parole: I used to be.

Name: FINN
parole: Han Solo? The Rebellion General?

Name: RE
parole: No, the smuggler!

Name: FINN
parole: Wasn't he a war hero?!

Name: REY
parole: This is the ship that made the Kessel Run in fourteen parsecs...!

Name: HAN
parole: Twelve! Fourteen.

Name: HAN
parole: Hey! Some moof-milker put a compressor on the ignition line!

Name: REY
parole: Unkar Plutt did. I thought it was a mistake too, puts too much stress on

Name: HAN
parole: Chewie, throw 'em in a pod, we'll drop them at the nearest inhabited planet.

Name: REY
parole: Wait! No -- we need your help!

Name: HAN
parole: My help?

Name: REY
parole: This droid has to get to the Resistance base as soon as possible!

Name: FINN
parole: He's carrying a map to Luke Skywalker.

Name: FINN
parole: You are the Han Solo that fought with the Rebellion. You knew him.

Name: HAN
parole: Yeah, I knew him. I knew Luke.

Name: HAN
parole: Don't tell me a Rathtar's gotten LOOSE

Name: FINN
parole: Wait a what?! Did you just say Rathtars? Hey!

Name: FINN
parole: You're not hauling Rathtars on this freighter, are you?

Name: HAN
parole: I'm hauling Rathtars.

Name: HAN
parole: Oh great. It's the Guavian Death Gang -- they must've tracked us from Nantoon.

Name: REY
parole: What's a Rathtar?

Name: HAN
parole: They're big and dangerous...

Name: FINN
parole: Y'ever heard of the Trillia Massacre?!

Name: REY
parole: No.

Name: FINN
parole: Good.

Name: HAN
parole: I got three of 'em going to King Prana.

Name: FINN
parole: THREE?! How'd you get them on board?

Name: HAN
parole: I used to have a bigger crew.

Name: HAN
parole: Get below deck and stay there until I say so -- don't even think about taking the Falcon.

Name: REY
parole: What about BB-8?

Name: HAN
parole: He stays with me -- until I get rid of the gang, then you can have him back and be on your way.

Name: FINN
parole: What about the Rathtars... where are you keeping them?

Name: HAN
parole: There's one.

Name: REY
parole: What are you gonna do?

Name: HAN
parole: Same thing I always do talk my way out of it. Yes, I do. Every time.

Name: BALA-TIK
parole: Han Solo. You are a dead man.

Name: HAN
parole: Bala-Tik. What's the problem?

Name: BALA-TIK
parole: The problem is we loaned you fifty thousand for this job.

Name: REY
parole: Can you see them?

Name: FINN
parole: No.

Name: BALA-TIK
parole: I heard you also borrowed fifty thousand from Kanjiklub.

Name: HAN
parole: You know you can't trust those little freaks! How long've we known each other?

Name: REY
parole: They have blasters...

Name: FINN
parole: A lot of 'em.

Name: BALA-TIK
parole: The question is how much longer will we know each other? Not long. We want our money back now.

Name: HAN
parole: Ya think hunting Rathtars is cheap? I spent that money.

Name: BALA-TIK
parole: Kanjiklub wants their investment back, too.

Name: HAN
parole: I never made a deal with Kanjiklub!

Name: BALA-TIK
parole: Tell that to Kanjiklub.

Name: HAN
parole: Tasu Leech. Good to see you.

Name: TASU LEECH
parole: Wrong again, Solo. It's over for you.

Name: HAN
parole: Boys. You're both gonna get what I promised! Have I ever not delivered for you before?

Name: BALA-TIK
parole: Yeah.

Name: TASU LEECH
parole: Twice!

Name: HAN
parole: What was the second time?

Name: BALA-TIK
parole: Your game is old. There's no one in the galaxy left for you to swindle.

Name: TASU LEECH
parole: Nowhere left for you to hide.

Name: BALA-TIK
parole: That BB unit... the First Order is looking for one just like it. And two fugitives.

Name: HAN
parole: First I've heard of it.

Name: RAZOO QIN-FEE
parole: Search the freighter.

Name: REY
parole: Wait wait wait wait. If we close the blast doors in that corridor, we can trap both gangs!

Name: FINN
parole: Close the blast doors from here?

Name: REY
parole: Resetting the fuses should do it.

Name: HAN
parole: I got a bad feeling about this

Name: REY
parole: Oh no.

Name: FINN
parole: Oh no, what?

Name: REY
parole: Wrong fuses.

Name: BALA-TIK
parole: Kill them! And take the droid!

Name: FINN
parole: This was a mistake!

Name: REY
parole: Huge!

Name: REY
parole: What do they look like?

Name: FINN
parole: They look like that.

Name: FINN
parole: This way!

Name: REY
parole: Are you sure?

Name: REY
parole: FINN!

Name: FINN
parole: REY!

Name: REY
parole: FINN!!!!

Name: REY
parole: Finn!

Name: FINN
parole: It had me! But the door--!

Name: REY
parole: That was lucky!

Name: HAN
parole: I got the door. Cover us!

Name: HAN
parole: Chewie! You okay?

Name: HAN
parole: Wow. Come on! Come on!

Name: REY
parole: Han!

Name: HAN
parole: You, close the door behind us! You take care of Chewie!

Name: HAN
parole: Hey, where are you going?

Name: REY
parole: Unkar Plutt installed a fuel pump too if we don't prime that we're not going anywhere.

Name: HAN
parole: I hate that guy.

Name: REY
parole: And you could use a co-pilot.

Name: HAN
parole: I got one, he's back there.

Name: HAN
parole: Watch the thrust, we're goin' out of here at lightspeed

Name: REY
parole: From inside the hangar? Is that even possible?

Name: HAN
parole: I never ask that question until after I've done it.

Name: HAN
parole: This is not how I thought this day was gonna go angle the shields Hang on back there!

Name: FINN
parole: No problem!

Name: HAN
parole: Come on baby, don't let me down!

Name: HAN
parole: What?!

Name: REY
parole: Compressor.

Name: BALA-TIK
parole: Inform the First Order that Han Solo has the droid they want. And it's aboard the Millennium Falcon.

Name: SNOKE
parole: The droid will soon be delivered to the Resistance...

Name: SNOKE
parole: Leading them to the last Jedi. If Skywalker returns, the new Jedi will rise.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Supreme Leader, I take full responsibility for

Name: SNOKE
parole: General! Our strategy must now change.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: The weapon. It is ready. I believe the time has come to use it. We shall destroy the government that supports the Resistance, the Republic. Without their friends to protect them, the Resistance will be vulnerable, and we will stop them before they reach Skywalker.

Name: SNOKE
parole: Go. Oversee preparations.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Yes, Supreme Leader.

Name: SNOKE
parole: There's been an awakening. Have you felt it?

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Yes.

Name: SNOKE
parole: There's something more. The droid we seek is aboard the Millennium Falcon. In the hands of your father, Han Solo.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: He means nothing to me.

Name: SNOKE
parole: Even you, master of the Knights of Ren, have never faced such a test.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: By the grace of your training, I will not be seduced.

Name: SNOKE
parole: We shall see. We shall see.

Name: HAN
parole: Electrical overload!

Name: REY
parole: I can fix that!

Name: HAN
parole: The coolant's leaking!

Name: REY
parole: Try transferring auxiliary power to the secondary tank

Name: HA
parole: Secondary tank, I got it!

Name: FINN
parole: Chewie, come on! I need help with this giant hairy thing! Stop moving! Chewie!

Name: HAN
parole: You hurt Chewie, you're gonna deal with me!

Name: FINN
parole: Hurt him?! He almost killed me six times!

Name: HAN
parole: This hyperdrive blows there's gonna be pieces of us in three different systems.

Name: HAN
parole: What'd you do?

Name: REY
parole: I by-passed the compressor.

Name: HAN
parole: Move, Ball.

Name: HAN
parole: Nah, don't say that, you did great. Just rest.

Name: HAN
parole: Good job, kid. And thanks.

Name: FINN
parole: You're welcome.

Name: HAN
parole: So, fugitives, huh?

Name: REY
parole: The First Order wants the map.

Name: REY
parole: Finn is with the Resistance I'm just a scavenger.

Name: HAN
parole: Let's see whatcha got.

Name: REY
parole: Go ahead.

Name: HAN
parole: This map's not complete. It's just a piece. Ever since Luke disappeared,  people have been looking for him.

Name: REY
parole: Why'd he leave?

Name: HAN
parole: He was training a new generation of Jedi. One boy, an apprentice turned against him, destroyed it all. Luke felt responsible... He walked away from everything.

Name: FINN
parole: Do you know what happened to him?

Name: HAN
parole: There're a lot of rumors. Stories. The people who knew him the best think he went looking for the first Jedi temple.

Name: REY
parole: The Jedi were real?

Name: HAN
parole: I used to wonder that myself. Thought it was a bunch of mumbo-jumbo magical power holding together good, evil, the dark side and the light. 'Crazy thing is, it's true. The Force, the Jedi, all of it. It's all true.

Name: HAN
parole: No, you rest. You want my help? You're getting it. Gonna see an old friend. She'll get your droid home. This is our stop.

Name: REY
parole: I didn't know there was this much green in the whole galaxy...

Name: FINN
parole: Hey, Solo -- I'm not sure what we're walking into here

Name: HAN
parole: D'you just call me "Solo"?

Name: FINN
parole: Sorry. Han-- Mr. Solo. You should know, I'm a big deal in the Resistance. Which puts a real targe on my back. Are there any conspirators here? First Order sympathizers?

Name: HAN
parole: Listen big deal, you've got another problem. Women always figure out the truth.

Name: HAN
parole: Always.

Name: HAN
parole: You might need this.

Name: REY
parole: I think I can handle myself.

Name: HAN
parole: I know you do. That's why I'm giving it to you. Take it.

Name: HAN
parole: You know how to use one of these?

Name: REY
parole: Yeah, you pull the trigger.

Name: HAN
parole: There's a little bit more to it than that. You got a lot to learn. You got a name?

Name: REY
parole: Rey.

Name: HAN
parole: Rey. I've been thinkin' about bringing on some more crew, Rey. A second mate. Someone to help out. Someone who can keep up with Chewie and me, appreciates the Falcon.

Name: REY
parole: Are you offering me a job?

Name: HAN
parole: I wouldn't be nice to you. It doesn't pay much.

Name: REY
parole: You're offering me a job.

Name: HAN
parole: I'm thinking about it.

Name: HAN
parole: Well?

Name: REY
parole: If you were, I'd be flattered. But I have to get home.

Name: HAN
parole: Jakku?

Name: REY
parole: I've already been away too long.

Name: HAN
parole: Chewie, check out the ship as best you can.

Name: HAN
parole: It's too bad. Chewie kind of likes you.

Name: FINN
parole: Solo, why are we here again?

Name: HAN
parole: To get your droid on a clean ship.

Name: REY
parole: Clean?

Name: HAN
parole: Do you think it was luck that Chewie and I found the Falcon? If we can find it on our scanners, the First Order's not far behind. Want to get BB-8 to the Resistance? Maz Kanata is our best bet.

Name: FINN
parole: We can trust her, right?

Name: HAN
parole: Relax, kid. She's run this watering hole for a thousand years. Maz is a bit of an acquired taste, so let me do the talking. And whatever you do, don't stare...

Name: REY
parole: At what?

Name: FINN
parole: At what?

Name: HAN
parole: Any of it.

Name: MAZ
parole: Han Solo!

Name: HAN
parole: Oh boy.  Hey, Maz!

Name: MAZ
parole: Where's my boyfriend?

Name: HAN
parole: Chewie's working on the Falcon.

Name: MAZ
parole: I like that Wookiee. I assume you need something. Desperately. Let's get to it.

Name: GA-97
parole: Alert the Resistance. Their missing droid is here!

Name: BAZIN
parole: Inform the First Order... I've found the droid.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Forgive me. I feel it again. The pull to the light. Supreme Leader senses it. Show me again, the power of the darkness, and I will let nothing stand in our way. Show me, Grandfather, and I will finish what you started.

Name: MAZ
parole: A map to Skywalker himself? You're right back in the mess.

Name: HAN
parole: Maz, I need you to get this droid to Leia.

Name: MAZ
parole: Hmm. No. You've been running away from this fight for too long. Han, nyakee nago wadda. Go home!

Name: HAN
parole: Leia doesn't want to see me.

Name: FINN
parole: Please, we came here for your help.

Name: REY
parole: What fight?

Name: MAZ
parole: The only fight against the dark side. Through the ages, I've seen evil take many forms. The Sith. The Empire. Today, it is the First Order. Their shadow is spreading across the galaxy. We must face them. Fight them. All of us.

Name: FINN
parole: There is no fight against the First Order! Not one we can win. Look around. There's no chance we haven't been recognized already. I bet you the First Order is on their way right--

Name: FINN
parole: What's this? What are you doing?

Name: FINN Solo
parole: what is she doing?

Name: HAN
parole: I don't know, but it ain't good.

Name: MAZ
parole: If you live long enough you see the same eyes in different people. I'm looking at the eyes of a man who wants to run.

Name: FINN
parole: You don't know a thing about me. Where I'm from. What I've seen.

Name: FINN
parole: You don't know the First Order like I do. They'll slaughter us. We all  need to run.

Name: MAZ
parole: You see those two? They'll trade work for transportation to the Outer Rim. There, you can disappear.

Name: REY
parole: Finn!

Name: FINN
parole: Come with me.

Name: REY
parole: What about BB-8? We're not done yet. We have to get him back to your base.

Name: FINN
parole: I can't.

Name: HAN
parole: Keep it, kid.

Name: MAZ
parole: Who's the girl?

Name: FINN
parole: I was told you could get me to the Outer Rim.

Name: REY
parole: What are you doing?

Name: FINN
parole: Don't leave without me.

Name: REY
parole: You can't just go. I won't let you.

Name: FINN
parole: I'm not who you think I am.

Name: REY
parole: Finn, what are you talking about?

Name: FINN
parole: I'm not Resistance. I'm not a hero. I'm a Stormtrooper. Like all of them, I was taken from a family I'll never know. And raised to do one thing But my first battle, I made a choice. I wasn't going to kill for them. So I ran. Right into you. And you looked at me like no one ever had. I was ashamed of what I was. But I'm done  with the First Order. I'm never going back. Rey, come with me.

Name: REY
parole: Don't go.

Name: FINN
parole: Take care of yourself. Please.

Name: YOUNG GIRL
parole: NO!

Name: YOUNG GIRL
parole: No, come back!

Name: UNKAR PLUTT
parole: Quiet, girl!

Name: REY
parole: What was that? I shouldn't have gone in there.

Name: MAZ
parole: That lightsaber was Luke's. And his father's before him and now, it calls to you!

Name: REY
parole: I have to get back to Jakku.

Name: MAZ
parole: Han told me. Dear child. I see your eyes. You already know the truth. Whomever you're waiting for on Jakku, they're never coming back. But... there's someone who still could.

Name: REY
parole: Luke.

Name: MAZ
parole: The belonging you seek is not behind you. It is ahead. I am no Jedi, but I know the Force. It moves through and surrounds every living thing. Close your eyes. Feel it.

Name: MAZ
parole: The light. It's always been there. It will guide you. The saber. Take it.

Name: REY
parole: I'm never touching that again. I don't want any part of this.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Today is the end of the Republic! The end of a regime that acquiesces to disorder! At this very moment, in a system far from here the New Republic LIES to the GALAXY while secretly supporting the treachery of the loathsome Resistance. This fierce machine which you have built, upon which we stand, will bring an end to the Senate! To their cherished fleet! All remaining systems will bow to the First Order! And will remember this... as the last day of the Republic!

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: FIRE!

Name: FINN
parole: It was the Republic.

Name: FINN
parole: The First Order, they've done it. Where's Rey?

Name: REY
parole: What are you doing? You have to go back.

Name: REY
parole: BB-8. No, you can't -- you have to go back, you're too important. They'll help you.

Name: MAZ
parole: I've had this for ages...

Name: MAZ
parole: Kept it locked away.

Name: HAN
parole: Where'd you get that?

Name: MAZ
parole: A good question for another time. Take it! Find your friend!

Name: MAZ
parole: Those beasts! They're here!

Name: STORMTROOPER
parole: FN-417, hold position!

Name: REY
parole: Safety!

Name: STORMTROOPER 4
parole: Sir, the droid was spotted heading west, with a girl.

Name: REY
parole: You have to keep going, stay out of sight, I'll try to fight 'em off. I hope so, too.

Name: HAN
parole: Come on, Chewie!

Name: MAZ
parole: Rey and BB-8, they need you. Now go.

Name: FINN
parole: I need a weapon.

Name: MAZ
parole: You have one!

Name: HAN
parole: Hey, can I try that?

Name: HAN
parole: I like this thing.

Name: STORMTROOPER
parole: Traitor!

Name: HAN
parole: You okay, Big deal?

Name: FINN
parole: Thanks!

Name: STORMTROOPER
parole: Don't move! TK-338, we have targets in custody!

Name: STORMTROOPER
parole: We have incoming at two-eight-point- six! Move! Dispatch! Move! Scramble all squads! Repeat, scramble all squads! Anti-air cover en route to our position!

Name: HAN
parole: It's the Resistance.

Name: POE
parole: Go straight ahead and don't let these dogs scare you!

Name: JESS
parole: Copy that!

Name: SNAP
parole: We're with you, Poe!

Name: HAN
parole: Quick!

Name: FINN
parole: Woohoo! YEAH! That's one helluva pilot!

Name: POE
parole: WOOHOO!

Name: KYLO REN
parole: The girl I've heard so much about.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: The droid.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Where is it?

Name: STORMTROOPER
parole: Request air support!

Name: KYLO REN
parole: The map. You've seen it.

Name: STORMTROOPER
parole: Sir, Resistance fighters! We need more troops.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Pull the division out. Forget the  droid. We have what we need.

Name: STORMTROOPER
parole: Pull back the tree line!

Name: FINN
parole: NO!! REY!!!

Name: FINN
parole: No, no, no, no... REY!!

Name: FINN
parole: He took her! Did you see that? He took her. She's gone!

Name: HAN
parole: Yeah, yeah, I know...

Name: C-3PO
parole: Goodness! Han Solo! It is I, See-Threepio! You probably don't recognize me because of the red arm. Look who it is! Did you see who? Oh. Excuse me, Prin-- uh, General. Sorry. Come along, BB-8. Quickly. Yes, I must get my proper arm reinstalled.

Name: HAN
parole: You changed your hair.

Name: LEIA
parole: Same jacket.

Name: HAN
parole: No, new jacket.

Name: HAN
parole: I saw him. Leia, I saw our son. He was here.

Name: FINN
parole: Poe. Poe Dameron.

Name: FINN
parole: You're alive!

Name: POE
parole: So are you!

Name: FINN
parole: What happened to you?

Name: POE
parole: What happened? I got thrown from the crash, woke up at night -- no you, no ship, nothing--

Name: POE
parole: BB-8 says that you saved him.

Name: FINN
parole: No, no, no. It wasn't just me.

Name: POE
parole: You completed my mission, Finn. That's my jacket?

Name: FINN
parole: Oh here.

Name: POE
parole: No, no, no. Keep it. It suits you. You're a good man, Finn.

Name: FINN
parole: Poe -- I need your help.

Name: POE
parole: General Organa. Sorry to interrupt, this is Finn, he needs to talk to

Name: LEIA
parole: And I need to talk to him. That was incredibly brave, what you did. Renouncing the First Order, saving this man's life --

Name: FINN
parole: Thank you, ma'am -- but a friend of mine was taken prisoner--

Name: LEIA
parole: Han told me about the girl, I'm sorry.

Name: POE
parole: Finn's familiar with the weapon that destroyed the Hosnian system. He worked on the base.

Name: LEIA
parole: We're desperate for anything you can tell us.

Name: FINN
parole: That's where my friend was taken -- I've got to get there, fast.

Name: LEIA
parole: And I will do everything I can to help, but first you must tell us all you know.

Name: DR. KALONIA
parole: That sounds very scary. You must be so brave.

Name: C-3PO
parole: General, I regret to inform you, but this map recovered from BB-8 is only partially complete. And even worse, it matches no charted system on record. We simply do not have enough information to locate Master Luke.

Name: LEIA
parole: I can't believe I was so foolish to think that I could just find Luke and bring him home.

Name: HAN
parole: Leia...

Name: LEIA
parole: Don't do that.

Name: HAN
parole: Do what? She heads off.

Name: LEIA
parole: Anything.

Name: C-3PO
parole: Princesses.

Name: HAN
parole: I'm trying to be helpful!

Name: LEIA
parole: When did that ever help? And don't say the Death Star.

Name: C-3PO
parole: BB-8. You're wasting your time.

Name: C-3PO
parole: It is very doubtful that R2 would have the rest of the map in his backup data. I am afraid not. R2-D2 has been in low power mode ever since Master Luke went away. Sadly, he may never be his old self again.

Name: HAN
parole: Listen to me, will you? I know every time you... every time you look at me, you're reminded of him.

Name: LEIA
parole: You think I want to forget him? I want him back!

Name: HAN
parole: There was nothing we could've done. There was too much Vader in him.

Name: LEIA
parole: That's why I wanted him to train with Luke. I just never should have sent him away. That's when I lost him. That's when I lost you both.

Name: HAN
parole: We both had to deal with it in our own way. I went back to the only thing I was ever good at.

Name: LEIA
parole: We both did.

Name: HAN
parole: We lost our son, forever.

Name: LEIA
parole: No.It was Snoke.

Name: LEIA
parole: He seduced our son to the dark side. But we can still save him. Me. You.

Name: HAN
parole: If Luke couldn't reach him, how could

Name: LEIA
parole: Luke is a Jedi... you're his father. There's still light in him. I know it.

Name: GENERAL STATURA
parole: General, the reconnaissance report on the enemy base is coming.

Name: REY
parole: Where am I?

Name: KYLO REN
parole: You're my guest.

Name: REY
parole: Where are the others?

Name: KYLO REN
parole: You mean the murderers, traitors and thieves you call friends? You'll be relieved to hear that I have no idea.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: You still want to kill me.

Name: REY
parole: That happens when you're being hunted by a creature in a mask.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Tell me about the droid.

Name: REY
parole: He's a BB unit with a selenium drive and a thermal hyperscan vindicator

Name: KYLO REN
parole: He's carrying a section of a navigational chart. We have the rest, recovered from archives of the Empire. We need the last piece. And somehow, you convinced the droid to show it to you. You. A scavenger --

Name: KYLO REN
parole: You know I can take whatever I want.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: You're so lonely so afraid to leave At night, desperate to sleep you imagine an ocean. I see it  I see the island

Name: KYLO REN
parole: And Han Solo. You feel like he's the father you never had. He would've disappointed you.

Name: REY
parole: Get out of my head

Name: KYLO REN
parole: I know you've seen the map. It's in there... and now you'll give it to me. Don't be afraid. I feel it too.

Name: REY
parole: I'm not giving you anything.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: We'll see.

Name: REY
parole: You you're afraid that you will never be as strong as  Darth Vader!

Name: SNOKE
parole: This scavenger, resisted you?

Name: KYLO REN
parole: She's strong with the Force, untrained but, stronger than she knows.

Name: SNOKE
parole: And the droid?

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Ren believed it was no longer valuable to us.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: That the girl was all we needed. As a result, the droid has most likely been returned to the hands of the enemy. They may have the map already.

Name: SNOKE
parole: Then the Resistance must be destroyed before they get to Skywalker.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: We have their location. We tracked their reconnaissance ship to the Ileenium system.

Name: SNOKE
parole: Good. Then we will crush them once and for all. Prepare the weapon.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Supreme Leader. I can get the map from the girl. I just need your guidance.

Name: SNOKE
parole: If what you say about this girl is true, bring her to me.

Name: REY
parole: You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open.

Name: TROOPER GUARD 2
parole: What did you say?

Name: REY
parole: You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open.

Name: TROOPER GUARD 2
parole: I'll tighten those restraints, scavenger scum!

Name: REY
parole: You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open.

Name: TROOPER GUARD 2
parole: I will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open.

Name: REY
parole: And you will drop your weapon.

Name: TROOPER GUARD 2
parole: And I'll drop my weapon.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: NO!

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Begin charging the weapon!

Name: STARKILLER TECHNICIAN
parole: Yes, sir. Weapon charging.

Name: POE
parole: The scan data from Snap's reconnaissance flight confirms Finn's report.

Name: SNAP
parole: They've somehow created a hyper lightspeed weapon built within the planet itself.

Name: BRANCE
parole: A laser cannon?

Name: SNAP
parole: We're not sure how to describe a weapon of this scale.

Name: MAJOR EMATT
parole: It's another Death Star.

Name: POE
parole: I wish that were the case, Major. This was the Death Star. This is Starkiller Base.

Name: HAN
parole: So it's big.

Name: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
parole: How is it possible to power a weapon of this size?

Name: FINN
parole: It uses the power of the sun. As the weapon is charged, the sun is drained until it disappears.

Name: LEIA
parole: The First Order they're charging the weapon again, now. Our system is the next target.

Name: C-3PO
parole: Oh my. Without the Republic fleet, we're doomed.

Name: HAN
parole: Okay, how do we blow it up? There's always a way to do that.

Name: LEIA
parole: Han's right.

Name: ADMIRAL STATURA
parole: In order for that amount of power to be contained, that base would need some kind of thermal oscillator...

Name: FINN
parole: There is one.

Name: FINN
parole: Precinct 47. Here.

Name: ADMIRAL STATURA
parole: If we can destroy that oscillator, it might de-stabilize the core an cripple the weapon.

Name: MAJOR EMATT
parole: Maybe the planet.

Name: POE
parole: We'll go in there and we'll hit that oscillator with everything we got.

Name: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
parole: They have defensive shields that our ships cannot penetrate.

Name: HAN
parole: We disable the shields. Kid, you worked there, what do you  got?

Name: FINN
parole: I can do it.

Name: HAN
parole: I like this guy.

Name: FINN
parole: I can disable the shields. But I have to be there, on the planet--

Name: HAN
parole: We'll get you there.

Name: LEIA
parole: Han, how?

Name: HAN
parole: If I told you, you wouldn't like it.

Name: POE
parole: So we disable the shields, take out the oscillator and we blow up theirbig gun. All right. Let's go!

Name: HAN
parole: Chewie, check that donal capitator. Come on. Let's go. -- Finn, be careful with those - they're explosives.

Name: FINN
parole: Now you tell me?

Name: LEIA
parole: No matter how much we fought, I've always hated watching you leave.

Name: HAN
parole: That's what I did it. So you'd miss me.

Name: LEIA
parole: I did miss you.

Name: HAN
parole: It wasn't all bad, was it? Huh? Some of it was good.

Name: LEIA
parole: Pretty good.

Name: HAN
parole: Some things never change.

Name: LEIA
parole: True. You still drive me crazy.

Name: LEIA
parole: If you see our son again, bring him home.

Name: STORMTROOPER
parole: Sir, sensors triggered in hangar 718. We're searching the area.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: She's just beginning to test her  powers. The longer it takes to find her, the more dangerous she becomes.

Name: FINN
parole: How are we getting in?

Name: HAN
parole: Their shields have a fractional refresh rate. Keeps anything traveling slower than lightspeed from getting through.

Name: FINN
parole: We're gonna make our landing approach at lightspeed?!

Name: HAN
parole: Alright, Chewie, get ready.

Name: HAN
parole: And Now!

Name: HAN
parole: I AM PULLING UP!!!

Name: HAN
parole: I get any higher, they'll see us!

Name: OFFICER
parole: Sir, she was not found in hangar 718 but all troops are on alert.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Put every hangar on lock-down. She's going to try to steal a ship to--

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Han Solo...

Name: FINN
parole: The flooding tunnels are over that ridge. We'll get in that way.

Name: HAN
parole: What was your job when you were base here?

Name: FINN
parole: Sanitation.

Name: HAN
parole: Sanitation? Then how do you know how to disable the shields?

Name: FINN
parole: I don't. I'm just here to get Rey.

Name: HAN
parole: People are counting on us! The galaxy is counting on us!

Name: FINN
parole: Solo, we'll figure it out! We'll use the Force!

Name: HAN
parole: That's not how the Force works--!

Name: HAN
parole: Oh really, you're cold?

Name: FINN
parole: Come on!

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Report.

Name: FIRST ORDER OFFICER
parole: Weapon charged in fifteen minutes, sir.

Name: STORMTROOPER FN-9330
parole: Hey!

Name: HAN
parole: The longer we're here, less luck we're going to have. The shields?

Name: FINN
parole: I have an idea about that. Han and Chewie follow Finn.

Name: FINN
parole: Remember me?

Name: FINN
parole: Not anymore. The name's Finn, and I'm in charge. I'm in charge now, Phasma. I'm in charge.

Name: HAN
parole: Bring it down. Bring it down.

Name: FINN
parole: Follow me.

Name: FINN
parole: You want me to blast that bucket off your head? Lower the shields.

Name: CAPTAIN PHASMA
parole: You're making a big mistake.

Name: FIN
parole: Do it.

Name: FINN
parole: Solo, if this works, we're not going to have a lot of time to find Rey.

Name: HAN
parole: Don't worry kid, we won't leave here without her.

Name: CAPTAIN PHASMA
parole: You can't be so stupid as to think this will be easy. My troops will storm this block and kill you all.

Name: FINN
parole: I disagree. What do we do with her?

Name: HAN
parole: Is there a garbage chute? Trash compactor?

Name: FINN
parole: Yeah, there is...

Name: OFFICER
parole: General, their shields are down!

Name: C-3PO
parole: Thank the Maker!

Name: LEIA
parole: Han did it! Send them in!

Name: ADMIRAL STATURA
parole: Give Poe full authorization to attack.

Name: GULCH
parole: Black Leader, go to sub-lights. On your call.

Name: POE
parole: Roger, base red squad, blue squad,  take my lead.

Name: YOLO ZIFF
parole: Dropping out of lightspeed.

Name: POE
parole: Almost in range! Hit the target dead center, as many runs as we can get!

Name: SNAP
parole: Approaching target.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Dispatch all squadrons...

Name: COLONEL DATOO
parole: Yes, General.

Name: POE
parole: Let's light it up!

Name: ELLO ASTY
parole: But no damage!

Name: POE
parole: Yeah, we gotta keep hitting it! Another bombing run! Remember, when that sun is gone, that weapon will be ready to fire! But as long as there's light, we got a chance.

Name: POE
parole: Guys, we got a lot of company!

Name: FINN
parole: We'll use the charges to blow that blast door. I'll go in and draw fire, but I'm gonna need cover.

Name: HAN
parole: You sure you're up for this?

Name: FINN
parole: Hell no  I'll go in find and try to find Rey The troopers'll be on our tail. We have to be ready for that. There's an access tunnel that'll leads Why are you doing that? Why are you doingthis? I'm trying to come up with a plan.

Name: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
parole: The Oscillator's still standing.

Name: OFFICER
parole: X-wings coming back for another round of attacks!

Name: HAN
parole: Are you all right?

Name: REY
parole: Yeah.

Name: HAN
parole: Good.

Name: FINN
parole: What happened -- did he hurt you?

Name: REY
parole: Finn. What are you doing here?!

Name: FINN
parole: We came back for you.

Name: FINN
parole: What'd he say?

Name: REY
parole: That it was your idea.

Name: REY
parole: Thank you.

Name: FINN
parole: How did you get away?

Name: REY
parole: I can't explain it. And you wouldn't believe it.

Name: HAN
parole: Escape now. Hug later.

Name: SNAP
parole: I got one behind me. See it?

Name: JESS
parole: Yeah, I'm on it!

Name: JESS
parole: Furillo's been hit!

Name: SNAP
parole: Watch out for ground fire!

Name: HAN
parole: They're in trouble. We can't leave. My friend here has a bag full of explosives. Let's use 'em.

Name: KAYDEL KO CONNIX
parole: General, are you seeing this?

Name: VOBER DAND
parole: Two more X-wings down. That's half our fleet destroyed.

Name: C-3PO
parole: And their weapon will be fully charged in 10 minutes! It would take a miracle to save us now.

Name: HAN
parole: That girl knows her stuff.

Name: HAN
parole: We'll set the charges at every other column.

Name: HAN
parole: You're right. That's a better idea. You take the top.I'll go down below. Detonator. We'll meet back here.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Find them.

Name: HAN
parole: Ben!

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Han Solo. I've been waiting for this day for a long time.

Name: HAN
parole: Take off that mask. You don't need it.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: What do you think you'll see if I do?

Name: HAN
parole: The face of my son.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Your son is gone. He was weak and foolish, like his father. So I destroyed him.

Name: HAN
parole: That's what Snoke wants you to believe but it's not true. My son is alive.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: No. The Supreme Leader is wise.

Name: HAN
parole: Snoke is using you for your power. When he gets what he wants, he'll crush you -- you know it's true.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: It's too late.

Name: HAN
parole: No it's not. Leave here with me. Come home. We miss you.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: I'm being torn apart. I want to be free of this pain.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: I know what I have to do, but I don't know if I have the strength to do  it. Will you help me?

Name: HAN
parole: Yes. Anything.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: Thank you.

Name: FINN
parole: Solo.

Name: REY
parole: No, no.

Name: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
parole: The Oscillator's been damaged but is still functional.

Name: OFFICER TABALA ZO
parole: Admiral, their weapon will fire in two minutes.

Name: FINN
parole: The Falcon's this way.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: We're not done yet.

Name: REY
parole: You're a monster!

Name: KYLO REN
parole: It's just us now. Han Solo can't save you.

Name: FINN
parole: Rey! Rey! Rey... Rey... Oh no. O  no no no...

Name: KYLO REN
parole: TRAITOR!

Name: KYLO REN
parole: That lightsaber. It belongs to me!

Name: FINN
parole: Come get it.

Name: NIV LEK
parole: We just lost R-1!

Name: JESS
parole: We're overwhelmed! What do we do? It isn't working!

Name: YOLO ZIFF
parole: Black Leader, there's a brand new hole in that oscillator. Looks like our friends got in!

Name: POE
parole: Red Four! Red Six! Cover us!

Name: LT. BASTIAN
parole: I'm on it!

Name: ELLO ASTY
parole: Roger!

Name: POE
parole: Everybody else, hit the target hard! Give it everything you got!

Name: POE
parole: I need some help here! I need some help!

Name: LT. BASTIAN
parole: I'm coming in!

Name: JESS
parole: Watch out!

Name: ELLO ASTY
parole: I'm hit!

Name: POE
parole: All teams - I'm going in! Pull up and cover me!

Name: NIV LEK
parole: Copy that, Black Leader! Good luck, Poe!

Name: STARKILLER TECHNICIAN
parole: Weapon at full capacity in thirty seconds.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Prepare to fire.

Name: KYLO REN
parole: You need a teacher! I can show you the ways of the Force!

Name: REY
parole: The Force.

Name: COLONEL DATOO
parole: Lieutenant, get back to your station!

Name: YOUNG TECHNICIAN
parole: Just look. We won't survive  even Hux has gone!

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: Supreme Leader.

Name: GENERAL HUX
parole: The fuel cells have ruptured. The collapse of the planet has begun.

Name: SNOKE
parole: Leave the base at once and come to  me with Kylo Ren. It is time to complete his training.

Name: REY
parole: Finn! Finn...

Name: POE
parole: All teams! I got eyes on them!

Name: SNAP
parole: Yes!

Name: POE
parole: Our job's done here. Let's go home!

Name: MEDIC
parole: Easy, easy. He's hurt. We've got a heartbeat.

Name: C-3PO
parole: R2-D2! You've come back! You found what? How dare you call me that!

Name: C-3PO
parole: Find Master Luke how? Come, R2! We  must go tell the others at once!

Name: C-3PO
parole: General? Excuse me, General?

Name: C-3PO
parole: R2-D2 may contain some much needed  good news.

Name: LEIA
parole: Tell me.

Name: POE
parole: Yeah, all right, buddy, hold on --

Name: C-3PO
parole: Oh! The map! It is complete!

Name: C-3PO
parole: Oh my dear friend. How I've missed you.

Name: REY
parole: We'll see each other again. I believe that. Thank you, my friend.

Name: LEI
parole: Rey.

Name: LEIA
parole: May the Force be with you.
